text:
Priyanka Chopra Wore Tiffany's Jewellery Worth $1 Million For Her Bridal Shower In New York!
Priyanka Chopra Wore Tiffany's Jewellery Worth $1 Million For Her Bridal Shower In New York!
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas' grand wedding might be weeks away but the preps have already begun in full swing. PC and Nick are doing everything in their own style and this includes PC's grand bridal shower that was hosted in a Tiffany & Co. cafe, in New York.
After Nick shut the Tiffany store down to buy her an engagement ring, this time it was PC who got Tiffany's store shut down to celebrate her bridal shower with her family and close friends.
instagram
Donning a gorgeous white Marchesa gown, PC's tan Louboutin heels complimented the look perfectly. That's not all,
Agencies
PC paired up her dress with custom-made Tiffany's jewellery and it was worth a whopping $1 million!
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Well, now that's what you call a grand celebration!
title: Priyanka Chopra Wore Tiffany's Jewellery Worth $1 Million For Her Bridal Shower In New York!
description: PC and Nick are doing everything in their own style and this includes PC's grand bridal shower that was hosted in a Tiffany & Co. store, in New York. So according to reports, after Nick who had shut the Tiffany store to buy her a ring, this time it was PC who got Tiffany's store shut down to celebrate her bridal shower with her family and close friends.
